title: Andrea Barzagli
summary: Andrea Barzagli Ufficiale OMRI[3][4] (Italian pronunciation: [anˈdrɛːa barˈtsaʎʎi, -ˈdza-];[5][6] born 8 May 1981) is an Italian former professional footballer who played as a centre-back. A four-time member of the Serie A Team of the Year,[7] Barzagli is regarded as one of the best and most consistent defenders of his generation.[8]
